dossier.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a set of papers containing detailed, usually secret information about a person or subject
dossier.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A firm of detectives produced a dossier on his activities.
dossier.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a collection of written papers which contain detailed information about a particular subject or person
dossier.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She had a dossier of complaints about her neighbours.
They prepared a 20-page dossier detailing reasons why the new road was needed.
The FBI have kept a dossier on him since his radical student days.
